title: Emma Raducanu Overcomes Stalking to Regain Confidence
summary: Emma Raducanu, the British tennis champion who won the 2021 US Open, has opened up about a distressing stalking incident earlier this year. In February, a man with fixated behavior followed her to multiple tournaments in Dubai, leading to her feeling tearful and unsafe during a match. Dubai police intervened by removing the man and issuing a restraining order. Raducanu expresses that she has largely moved past the ordeal, though she admits to occasional unease when encountering unauthorized photographs of herself. She highlights the importance of security measures at events and praises the support she received. Currently training in Barcelona, Raducanu is focusing on her career while commuting from her family home in Bromley to London, seeking comfort and safety. This article explores her journey from fear to resilience, emphasizing her determination to rebuild her confidence and performance in tennis.
